bibl.title: Objects in Context, Objects in Use. Material Spatiality in Late Antiquity.
bibl.note: 26 papers from a meeting of Late Antique Archaeology held in Oxford in May 2004, entitled "Objects in Context, Objects in Use: the Archaeolgoy of Everyday Life", organised by Luke LAVAN and Bryan WARD-PERKINS.
bibl.seg: LAVAN Luke, Ellen SWIFT and Toon PUTZEYS (Edd.), Objects in Context, Objects in Use. Material Spatiality in Late Antiquity. (Late Antique Archaeology. 5.)
Leiden - Boston, Brill, 2007, 8°, 741 pp., figg. ISBN 978-90-04-16550-2. €149.

26 papers from a meeting of Late Antique Archaeology held in Oxford in May 2004, entitled "Objects in Context, Objects in Use: the Archaeolgoy of Everyday Life", organised by Luke LAVAN and Bryan WARD-PERKINS.
